page.title: 14Shopping. Hoo area.
page.content: Kettleburgh & Brandeston,the 2 large villages in the area,both have a combi- ned Post Office & shop. In Kettleburgh it is a well-stocked store where many people from the surr- ounding area buy a complete weeks supply of food.The Brandeston shop supplies the essentials on a smaller scale. Because bus services are poor most families have their own transport,enab- ling them to shop further afield at more competitive prices. Brandeston people tend to travel to Framlingham and the once a week bus service makes it a social occasion par- ticularly for the elderly.Because the bus from Kettleburgh goes to Wickham Mkt,it is there that the locals shop. There is a travelling fishmonger and milk is delivered.
